name: INTERCOM__CONTACTS
description: Retrieve all contacts from Intercom for customer relationship management and communication tracking

name: INTERCOM__CREATE_CONTACT
description: Create new contacts in Intercom for customer relationship management and communication tracking

role.description: Role of the contact (user or lead)

signed_up_at.description: Unix timestamp when user signed up

last_seen_at.description: Unix timestamp when user was last seen

owner_id.description: ID of the admin assigned to this contact

unsubscribed_from_emails.description: Whether contact unsubscribed from marketing emails

name: INTERCOM__UPDATE_CONTACT
description: Update existing contact information and attributes in Intercom for customer data management

id.description: Unique identifier of the contact to update

name: INTERCOM__CONVERSATIONS
description: Retrieve customer conversations for support ticket management and communication history tracking

name: INTERCOM__CREATE_CONVERSATION
description: Start new conversations with customers for proactive support and engagement communication

name: INTERCOM__REPLY_TO_CONVERSATION
description: Reply to existing customer conversations for ongoing support and communication management

id.description: Unique identifier of the conversation to reply to

message_type.description: Type of reply (comment visible to user, note internal only)

admin_id.description: ID of admin sending the reply

attachment_urls.description: URLs of attachments to include in reply

intercom_user_id.description: Intercom user ID if replying as user

name: INTERCOM__COMPANIES
description: Retrieve company information from Intercom for B2B customer relationship and account management

name: INTERCOM__CREATE_COMPANY
description: Create company records in Intercom for B2B customer account management and organization tracking

company_id.description: Unique identifier for the company in your system

size.description: Number of employees at the company

created_at.description: Unix timestamp when company was created

name: INTERCOM__ADMINS
description: Retrieve admin users and team members for Intercom workspace management and assignment tracking

name: INTERCOM__SEND_MESSAGE
description: Send targeted messages to customers for marketing campaigns, announcements, and proactive communication

id.description: ID of the admin sending message

name: INTERCOM__TAGS
description: Retrieve tags for organizing and categorizing contacts, companies, and conversations in Intercom

name: INTERCOM__CREATE_TAG
description: Create tags for organizing and categorizing customer data and conversations in Intercom workspace

name.description: Name of the tag to create

name: INTERCOM__TAG_CONTACT
description: Apply tags to contacts for organization, segmentation, and targeted communication campaigns

contact_id.description: Unique identifier of the contact to tag

id.description: ID of the tag to apply

name: INTERCOM__SEGMENTS
description: Retrieve customer segments for targeted marketing campaigns and audience analysis in Intercom

include_count.description: Include user count for each segment

name: INTERCOM__NOTES
description: Retrieve notes attached to contacts for internal team communication and customer context tracking

name: INTERCOM__CREATE_NOTE
description: Create internal notes for contacts to share team insights and customer context information

admin_id.description: ID of admin creating the note

id.description: ID of the contact to attach note to

name: INTERCOM__SEARCH_CONVERSATIONS
description: Search customer conversations using filters and keywords for support analytics and conversation discovery

name: INTERCOM__SEARCH_CONTACTS
description: Search contacts using advanced filters for customer segmentation and targeted outreach campaigns

name: INTERCOM__EVENTS
description: Retrieve customer events and activity tracking for behavior analysis and engagement insights

type.description: Type of entity that performed events

intercom_user_id.description: Intercom user ID to get events for

user_id.description: External user ID to get events for

email.description: Email address to get events for

name: INTERCOM__CREATE_EVENT
description: Track custom events for customer behavior analysis, product usage monitoring, and engagement scoring

event_name.description: Name of the event to track

user_id.description: External user ID who performed the event

intercom_user_id.description: Intercom user ID who performed the event

email.description: Email of user who performed the event

name: INTERCOM__DATA_ATTRIBUTES
description: Retrieve data attributes configuration for custom fields and contact/company metadata management

name: INTERCOM__CREATE_DATA_ATTRIBUTE
description: Create custom data attributes for enhanced contact and company information tracking and segmentation

description.description: Description of what this attribute tracks

options.description: Predefined options for the attribute (for select/multiselect types)

full_name.description: Full name with namespace (automatically generated if not provided)

name: INTERCOM__ASSIGN_CONVERSATION
description: Assign conversations to specific team members for workload distribution and responsibility tracking

id.description: Unique identifier of the conversation to assign

admin_id.description: ID of admin to assign conversation to

assignee_id.description: ID of team member to assign to

name: INTERCOM__CLOSE_CONVERSATION
description: Close customer conversations to mark support tickets as resolved and update conversation status

id.description: Unique identifier of the conversation to close

admin_id.description: ID of admin closing the conversation

name: INTERCOM__HELP_CENTER_COLLECTIONS
description: Retrieve help center article collections for knowledge base management and self-service support

name: INTERCOM__ARTICLES
description: Retrieve help center articles for knowledge base content management and customer self-service

name: INTERCOM__CREATE_ARTICLE
description: Create help center articles for building knowledge base content and customer self-service resources

author_id.description: ID of admin authoring the article

parent_id.description: ID of parent collection for the article

name: INTERCOM__UPDATE_ARTICLE
description: Update help center articles for maintaining current knowledge base content and customer support resources

id.description: Unique identifier of the article to update

name: INTERCOM__SUBSCRIPTION_TYPES
description: Retrieve subscription types for managing customer email preferences and communication settings
